source.name: flip an image both horizontally and vertically
source.text: To flip an image both horizontally and vertically, you can apply the `ImageOps.flip()` function to the result of the <<<ImageOps.mirror>>>() function applied to the base image.
source.guidance: By applying the `ImageOps.mirror()` function to the base image and then applying the `ImageOps.flip()` function to the result, you can flip the image both horizontally and vertically, creating a diagonal reflection effect or additional image variations.

text: To flip an image both horizontally and vertically, you can apply the `ImageOps.flip()` function to the result of the
() function applied to the base image.
